#summary Create an Invite ID with which to invite a user to a call

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_guest


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
|| *Required* || *Name* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| required || callerJabberId || integer || Jabber ID of the inviting user ||
|| || calleeJabberId || string || Jabber ID of the invited user (e.g. 64@jabber.tokbox.com) ||
|| || call_id || string || Call ID returned from [CreateCall Create Call] API function ||
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
|| *Code* || *Exception* || *Description* ||
|| 401 || UnauthorizedUserException || You are not authorized to make requests as userid ###. Authorized as ####. ||
|| 500 || SerializableException || Call for call_id: #### not found. ||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <createInvite callerJabberId="######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com" calleeJabberId="######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com" callId="8u17nnalmsqve7bp">
          <inviteId>tb805j6mm112lgdy</inviteId>
     </createInvite>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/calls/invite</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="####"/>
     <timer startTime="1221984737.7179" execTime="103.66797447205"/>
</tokResult>
}}}

==Notes==
  * The calleeJabberId is used for missed call notifications
  * Clients are expected to use inviteids to join calls
